page.title: 15Band Concerts,Christingle
page.content:
At Layston Court Gardens on Sunday afternoons there is often a band concert to amuse people walking by. The usual performers are Ware Town Band and the Salvation Army Band.
A week before Christmas at St.Mary's, Aspenden, a candlelight service is held. No electricity is used. The service is so popular that all the seats are taken and people have to stand at the back.
At St.Peter's, a service called Christingle takes place, which the Cubs and Brownies attend. Each child receives an orange with a candle in the middle and sweets on the top.
